headline: Emerson Electric (NYSE:EMR) Sees 13% Weekly Drop; Leticia Gonçalves Lourenco Resigns From Board
summary: Emerson Electric (NYSE:EMR) experienced a 13% decline in its stock price over the past week, a movement coinciding with significant market turbulence and board-level changes within the company. Leticia Gonçalves Lourenco's resignation from Emerson's Board of Directors was announced amidst a broader market sell-off, which saw indices like the Dow and S&P 500 dropping significantly due to global trade tensions and volatile investor sentiment. As Emerson operates in an interconnected global...
